explains: n. 庞塞（拉丁美洲波多黎各岛南部港市）

sentences.en: Ponce was not a man to wast time in any undertaking.
sentences.cn: 庞塞是位做任何事情都不耽搁时间的人。

sentences.en: Ponce was not a man to waste time in any undertaking.
sentences.cn: 帮塞是个不论办理什么事都不浪费时间的人。

sentences.en: Ponce was as heartless and unfeeling as any wild beast.
sentences.cn: 帮塞毫无心肝，凶残犹如野兽。
